lines.text: Nobody likes me. Why would he?
Chuck Norris? Chuck Norris? He doesn't compete anymore kid, and the main reason, one of the main reasons he doesn't compete anymore is me. He doesn't compete 'cause I would kick his ass.
[a still somewhat asthmatic Barry is determined to join in the push-ups in gym class]
Gabrewski, if you die I'm going to shoot myself and come on after you!
Come on, Barry. That's it. Use your legs.
you must realize that the greatest weapon you possess is self-control.
No anger. You are here to confront bricks, not that stupid boy.

[Jerry smells that drink that Mr. Lee has given Barry]
What is that smell?
It must be a sewage backup around here.

[to Barry]
If that's true kid, you have less brains than a woodpecker on an aluminum telephone pole.
